Subject: FUNDER CONTRACTS VS NHN PORTAL AND BILLING GUIDE
Importance: High

 

Good day All,

I trust this mail finds you well.

 

There has been some concerns brought under my attention, of which I am also getting quite a few queries about.

 

I would like to share the following with you:

 

What is our target condition?

* To capture and charge the correct tariff for each admission.

* To get ALL accounts paid.

* To be knowledgeable around the contracts negotiated with NHN.

* Have a smooth flow of patient journey from admission until discharge

* To have a smooth value stream and  standard work around processes to achieve the above

 

What is our current condition?

* We are not always admitting patients on the correct tariff

* We are not updating accounts correctly with the fund (LOS, meds)

* Therapy treatments not paid or authâ€™d.

* Creating more work for ourselves at a later stage if we donâ€™t spend an extra 5min NOW to sort out a problem -we are reactive and not proactive

 

 

What is our obstacles?

* Lack of knowledge on the contracts negotiated with the funds

* Not correct or optimal usage of the  NHN portal as a resource of information

* Frustration because we have to re-work events to get it paid

* Not reading the fundersâ€™ disclaimers (we do not understand what the funders want)

 

What is our next step?

From Head office:

* Review or develop standard work for usage of the NHN portal and the overall CM standard work

* Organise a CM workshop for early next year

 

From all CMâ€™s:

* Familiarise ourselves with the Fundersâ€™ needs, their disclaimers and the non-tariff table index

 

What have we learnt?

* To be proactive and not reactive

* To learn from our mistakes

 

Kind regards,
